styles.header-inner: mx-auto px-4 py-4 flex items-center justify-between gap-4
styles.nav-link: text-sm text-slate-700 hover:text-blue-600 px-3 py-2 rounded-md transition
styles.nav-link-active: text-sm px-3 py-2 rounded-md bg-blue-50 text-blue-700
styles.h6: text-base font-medium text-slate-700 mb-2 uppercase tracking-wide
styles.blockquote: pl-4 border-l-4 border-slate-200 italic text-slate-700 bg-slate-50 p-3 rounded
styles.code: font-mono text-sm bg-slate-100 px-2 py-1 rounded text-slate-900
styles.pre: font-mono text-sm bg-slate-900 text-slate-100 p-4 rounded overflow-auto
styles.kbd: font-mono text-xs bg-slate-100 px-2 py-1 rounded border border-slate-200
styles.table: w-full border-collapse text-sm bg-white rounded-md overflow-hidden
styles.caption: text-sm text-slate-500 py-2
styles.th: text-left px-3 py-2 bg-slate-50 text-slate-700 font-medium border-b border-slate-100
styles.td: px-3 py-2 border-b border-slate-100 text-slate-700 align-top
styles.label: block text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 mb-1
styles.input: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-md bg-white text-slate-900 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200
styles.input-text: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-md bg-white text-slate-900
styles.input-search: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-full bg-white text-slate-900
styles.input-date: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-md bg-white text-slate-900
styles.input-number: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-md bg-white text-slate-900
styles.textarea: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-md bg-white text-slate-900
styles.select: w-full px-3 py-2 border border-slate-300 rounded-md bg-white text-slate-900
styles.button: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 rounded-md bg-blue-600 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 transition
styles.button-outline: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 rounded-md border border-slate-300 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50
styles.button-text: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 text-blue-600 hover:underline
styles.button-icon: inline-flex items-center justify-center p-2 rounded-md hover:bg-slate-100
styles.checkbox: h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 border border-slate-300 rounded
styles.radio: h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 border border-slate-300 rounded-full
styles.switch: relative inline-flex items-center h-6 rounded-full w-11 bg-slate-200
styles.details: mb-4 bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-md p-3
styles.dialog: bg-white p-6 rounded-xl shadow-lg max-w-lg mx-auto border border-slate-100
styles.modal: fixed inset-0 flex items-center justify-center p-4
styles.tooltip: bg-slate-800 text-white text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded shadow-sm
styles.popover: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-md p-3 shadow
styles.toast: fixed bottom-6 right-6 bg-slate-900 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-md shadow-md
styles.badge: inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full bg-blue-600 text-white text-xs
styles.chip: inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1 rounded-full bg-slate-100 text-slate-800 text-sm
styles.avatar: h-10 w-10 rounded-full bg-slate-200 flex items-center justify-center text-slate-700
styles.card: bg-white rounded-lg p-4 border border-slate-100 shadow-sm
styles.badge-pill: inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full bg-blue-600 text-white text-sm
styles.tab-active: px-3 py-2 text-sm text-blue-600 border-b-2 border-blue-600
styles.accordion-header: px-4 py-3 cursor-pointer flex items-center justify-between
